article.title: Iowa U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Iowa U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​

Des Moines Office Contact Information

U.S. Export Assistance Center

749 Federal Building
210 Walnut Street
Des Moines, IA 50309
Phone: 515-284-4590
Fax : 515-288-1437
Email: office.desmoines@trade.gov​
Website:http://www.export.gov/iowa

Des Moines Staff

Patricia Cook, Director
Phone: 515-284-4590
Fax : 515-288-1437
Email:patricia.cook@trade.gov

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30 ​am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​

article.seometadatadescription: Contact the Iowa U.S. Export Assistance Center.
